Table.Name: aux_qso_icrf2_match
Table.Description: Auxilliary QSO solution source matches to ICRF2 defining source

Column.Name: ra_dec_corr
Column.Description: Correlation between Right Ascension and Declination

Column.Name: astrometric_priors_used
Column.Description: Type of prior used in the astrometric solution

Column.Name: icrf2_match
Column.Description: ICRF2 designation of the source matched to this Gaia source

Column.Name: rot_flag
Column.Description: Flag indicating how this source was used to fix the orientation of the reference frame of the Gaia DR1 solution

Column.Name: type_best_classification
Column.Description: Best type classification estimate out of {"DCEP", "T2CEP", "ACEP"}

Column.Name: type2_best_sub_classification
Column.Description: Best subclassification estimate for typeBestClassification="T2CEP" out of {"BL_HER", "W_VIR","RV_TAU"}

Column.Name: mode_best_classification
Column.Description: Best mode classification estimate out of {"FUNDAMENTAL", "FIRST_OVERTONE","SECOND_OVERTONE","UNDEFINED","NOT_APPLICABLE"}

Column.Name: p1
Column.Description: Period corresponding to the maximum peak in the periodogram of G band time series

Column.Name: p1_error
Column.Description: Uncertainty on the period corresponding to the maximum peak in the periodogram of G band time series

Column.Name: epoch_g
Column.Description: Epoch of the maximum of the light curve in the G band

Column.Name: epoch_g_error
Column.Description: Uncertainty on epoch of the maximum of the light curve in the G band

Column.Name: int_average_g
Column.Description: Intensity-averaged magnitude in the G band

Column.Name: int_average_g_error
Column.Description: Uncertainty on the intensity-averaged magnitude in the G band

Column.Name: peak_to_peak_g
Column.Description: Peak-to-peak amplitude of the G band light curve

Column.Name: peak_to_peak_g_error
Column.Description: Uncertainty on peak-to-peak amplitude of the G band light curve

Column.Name: num_harmonics_for_p1
Column.Description: Number of harmonics used to model P1 of the light curve

Column.Name: r21_g
Column.Description: Fourier decomposition parameter r21G: A2/A1 (for G band)

Column.Name: r21_g_error
Column.Description: Uncertainty on Fourier decomposition parameter r21G

Column.Name: phi21_g
Column.Description: Fourier decomposition parameter phi21G: phi2 - 2*phi1 (for G band)

Column.Name: phi21_g_error
Column.Description: Uncertainty on Fourier decomposition parameter phi21G

Table.Name: ext_phot_zero_point
Table.Description: Photometric zero-point data for Gaia passbands

Column.Name: g_mag_zero_oint_error
Column.Description: Uncertainty on G magnitude zero point

Column.Name: bp_mag_zero_point_error
Column.Description: Uncertainty on BP magnitude zero point

Column.Name: rp_mag_zero_oint_error
Column.Description: Uncertainty on RP magnitude zero point

Table.Name: gaia_hip_tycho2_match
Table.Description: Cross-identifications between Gaia and Tycho2/Hipparcos sources used in TGA

Column.Name: hip_tyc_oid
Column.Description: Initial Gaia Source List identifier for Hipparcos/Tycho2

Column.Name: ext_cat_solution_type
Column.Description: Type of solution in the Hipparcos/Tycho2 catalogue

Table.Name: gaia_source
Table.Description: Contains the parameters provided for each source in Gaia Data Release 1

Column.Name: random_index
Column.Description: Random index used to select subsets

Column.Name: pmra
Column.Description: Proper motion in Right Ascension direction

Column.Name: pmra_error
Column.Description: Error of proper motion in Right Ascension direction

Column.Name: pmdec_error
Column.Description: Error of proper motion in Declination direction

Column.Name: ra_dec_corr
Column.Description: Correlation between Right Ascension and Declination

Column.Name: ra_parallax_corr
Column.Description: Correlation between Right Ascension and parallax

Column.Name: ra_pmra_corr
Column.Description: Correlation between Right Ascension and proper motion in Right Ascension

Column.Name: ra_pmdec_corr
Column.Description: Correlation between Right Ascension and proper motion in Declination

Column.Name: dec_pmra_corr
Column.Description: Correlation between Declination and proper motion in Right Ascension

Column.Name: dec_pmdec_corr
Column.Description: Correlation between Declination and proper motion in Declination

Column.Name: parallax_pmra_corr
Column.Description: Correlation between parallax and proper motion in Right Ascension

Column.Name: parallax_pmdec_corr
Column.Description: Correlation between parallax and proper motion in Declination

Column.Name: pmra_pmdec_corr
Column.Description: Correlation between proper motion in Right Ascension and proper motion in Declination

Column.Name: astrometric_n_obs_al
Column.Description: Total number of observations in the Along-Scan direction

Column.Name: astrometric_n_obs_ac
Column.Description: Total number of observations in the Across-Scan direction

Column.Name: astrometric_n_good_obs_al
Column.Description: Number of good observations in the Along-Scan direction

Column.Name: astrometric_n_good_obs_ac
Column.Description: Number of good observations in the Across-Scan direction

Column.Name: astrometric_n_bad_obs_al
Column.Description: Number of bad observations in the Along-Scan direction

Column.Name: astrometric_n_bad_obs_ac
Column.Description: Number of bad observations in the Across-Scan direction

Column.Name: astrometric_delta_q
Column.Description: Hipparcos/Gaia data discrepancy (Hipparcos subset of TGAS only)

Column.Name: astrometric_weight_al
Column.Description: Mean astrometric weight of the source Along-Scan

Column.Name: astrometric_weight_ac
Column.Description: Mean astrometric weight of the source Across-Scan

Column.Name: astrometric_priors_used
Column.Description: Type of prior used in the astrometric solution

Column.Name: matched_observations
Column.Description: Amount of observations matched to this source

Column.Name: scan_direction_strength_k1
Column.Description: Degree of concentration of scan directions across the source

Column.Name: scan_direction_strength_k2
Column.Description: Degree of concentration of scan directions across the source

Column.Name: scan_direction_strength_k3
Column.Description: Degree of concentration of scan directions across the source

Column.Name: scan_direction_strength_k4
Column.Description: Degree of concentration of scan directions across the source

Column.Name: scan_direction_mean_k1
Column.Description: Mean position angle of scan directions across the source

Column.Name: scan_direction_mean_k2
Column.Description: Mean position angle of scan directions across the source

Column.Name: scan_direction_mean_k3
Column.Description: Mean position angle of scan directions across the source

Column.Name: scan_direction_mean_k4
Column.Description: Mean position angle of scan directions across the source

Column.Name: phot_g_n_obs
Column.Description: Number of observations contributing to G band photometry

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates

Table.Name: hipparcos_new_reduction
Table.Description: Hipparcos New Reduction: The Astrometric Catalogu

Column.Name: ic
Column.Description: Entry in one of the supplementary catalogues

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Right Ascension in the ICRS at epoch 1991.25

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Declination in the ICRS at epoch 1991.25

Column.Name: ra_rad
Column.Description: Right Ascension in the ICRS at epoch 1991.25

Column.Name: de_rad
Column.Description: Declination in the ICRS at epoch 1991.25

Column.Name: sn
Column.Description: Solution type in the New Reduction

Column.Name: so
Column.Description: Solution type in the old reduction

Column.Name: e_b_v
Column.Description: Formal error on B-V colour index

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Celestial Right Ascension at catalogue epoch

Column.Name: pm_ra
Column.Description: Proper motion in RA at catalogue epoch

Column.Name: pm_dec
Column.Description: Proper motion in Dec at catalogue epoch

Column.Name: pm_ra_error
Column.Description: Error in proper motion in RA

Column.Name: pm_dec_error
Column.Description: Error in proper motion in Dec

Column.Name: mag_grvs_error
Column.Description: Error on RVS G magnitude estimate

Column.Name: source_mag_grvs
Column.Description: Source of the RVS G magnitude

Column.Name: classification
Column.Description: Classification, simply a 0=star and 1=nonstar taken from different sources as given in the souce_classification field

Column.Name: toggle_asc
Column.Description: A flag that indicates if the object is used for the Atittude Star Catalog

Column.Name: aux_gsc23
Column.Description: Flag indicating presence in GSC2.3 (0 = no; 1 = yes)

Column.Name: aux_sdss
Column.Description: Flag indicating presence in SDSS (0 = no; 1 = yes)

Column.Name: aux_ucac
Column.Description: Flag indicating presence in UCAC (0 = no; 1 = yes)

Column.Name: aux_lqrf
Column.Description: Flag indicating presence in LQRF (0 = no; 1 = yes)

Column.Name: aux_tycho
Column.Description: Flag indicating presence in Tycho (0 = no; 1 = yes)

Column.Name: aux_hip
Column.Description: Flag indicating presence in Hipparcos (0 = no; 1 = yes)

Column.Name: aux_ppmxl
Column.Description: Flag indicating presence in PPMXL (0 = no; 1 = yes)

Column.Name: aux_ogle
Column.Description: Flag indicating presence in OGLE (0 = no; 1 = yes)

Column.Name: aux_tmass
Column.Description: Flag indicating presence in 2MASS PSC (0 = no; 1 = yes)

Column.Name: aux_epc
Column.Description: Flag indicating presence in Ecliptic Poles Catalogue (0 = no; 1 = yes)

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates

Table.Name: igsl_source_catalog_ids
Table.Description: IGSL source identifiers in original catalogue

Table.Name: phot_variable_time_series_g_fov
Table.Description: Field-of-view transit level time series photometry of variable source

Column.Name: observation_time
Column.Description: Barycentric light-travle time corrected timestamp for each FoV observation

Column.Name: g_flux
Column.Description: G-band flux for each FoV observation

Column.Name: g_flux_error
Column.Description: Estimated uncertainty on G-band flux for each FoV observation

Column.Name: g_magnitude
Column.Description: G-band magnitude for each FoV observation

Column.Name: rejected_by_variability_processing
Column.Description: True when this FoV observation was excluded from the variability analysis

Table.Name: phot_variable_time_series_g_fov_statistical_parameters
Table.Description: Statistical parameters of field-of-view time series photometr

Column.Name: num_observations_processed
Column.Description: Number of processed G-band observations for variability analysis

Column.Name: mean_obs_time
Column.Description: Mean observation time (with respect to T0) of G-band time series

Column.Name: minimum
Column.Description: Minimum magnitude of the G-band time series

Column.Name: maximum
Column.Description: Maximum magnitude of the G-band time series

Column.Name: mean
Column.Description: Mean magnitude of the G-band time series

Column.Name: median
Column.Description: Median magnitude of the G-band time series

Column.Name: range
Column.Description: Difference between the highest and lowest magnitude of the G-band time series

Column.Name: std_dev
Column.Description: Square root of the unweighted variance of the G-band time series values

Column.Name: skewness
Column.Description: Standardized unweighted skewness of the G-band time series values

Column.Name: kurtosis
Column.Description: Standardized unweighted kurtosis of the G-band time series values

Column.Name: time_duration
Column.Description: Time duration of the G-band time series

Column.Name: median_absolute_deviation
Column.Description: Median Absolute Deviation of the G-band time series values

Column.Name: abbe
Column.Description: Abbe value of the G-band time series values

Column.Name: iqr
Column.Description: Inter-quartile range of the G-band time series values

Column.Name: id
Column.Description: Tycho2 identifier (constructed from the GSC region number)

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Observed Tycho2 Right Ascension in ICRS

Column.Name: ra_deg
Column.Description: Observed Tycho2 Right Ascension in ICRS

Column.Name: ra_m_deg
Column.Description: Mean Right Ascension, ICRS, epoch = J2000

Column.Name: e_ra_deg
Column.Description: Standard error in RA*cos(Dec) of observed Tycho2 RA

Column.Name: e_de_deg
Column.Description: Standard error of observed Tycho2 Dec

Column.Name: e_ra_m_deg
Column.Description: Standard error in RA*cos(Dec) of mean Tycho2 RA

Column.Name: e_de_m_deg
Column.Description: Standard error of mean Tycho2 Dec

Column.Name: e_pm_ra
Column.Description: Standard error in RA*cos(Dec) of RA proper motion

Column.Name: e_pm_de
Column.Description: Standard error of Dec proper motion

Column.Name: q_ra_m_deg
Column.Description: Goodness of fit for mean RA

Column.Name: q_de_m_deg
Column.Description: Goodness of fit for mean Dec

Column.Name: ccdm
Column.Description: CCDM component identifier for Hipparcos stars

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates

Column.Name: classification
Column.Description: Photometric variability classification "RRLYR" (for RR Lyrae) or "CEP" (for Cepheid)
